about_the_game:
Can you become a leader in the Galactic Economy?

Buy spaceships and spacestations on you way to get some additional income. Roll the dice and see what you can achieve in this board game.

Details:
- Local Multiplayer
- Network-Multiplayer
- Challenge other players
- Start as a regular employee on your way to become a galactic entrepreneur
detailed_description:
Can you become a leader in the Galactic Economy?

Buy spaceships and spacestations on you way to get some additional income. Roll the dice and see what you can achieve in this board game.

Details:
- Local Multiplayer
- Network-Multiplayer
- Challenge other players
- Start as a regular employee on your way to become a galactic entrepreneur

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Latest Ubuntu LTS
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070, AMD Radeon Vega 56, equivalent or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Latest Ubuntu LTS
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070, AMD Radeon Vega 56, equivalent or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.15 and above
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support (Intel Core i5 or better)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal-capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.15 and above
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support (Intel Core i5 or better)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal-capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Galactic Economy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070, AMD Radeon Vega 56, equivalent or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070, AMD Radeon Vega 56, equivalent or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
